Detailed Description

template<typename Point>
class FilterKruskal< Point >

Implements Geometric Filter Kruskal on a well-seperated pair decomposition.

Geometric Filter Kruskal class This class takes a well seperated pair decomposition as input and outputs and edge set representation of the geometric minimum spanning tree. Currently, only the L2 metric is supported.
